&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&amp;sup2; + X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;RX&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; +    jR&amp;sup2;X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&amp;sup2; + X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;This gives us an entirely real number in the denominator, which in turn makes the necessary computations possible and practical. Our parallel RL impedance is still a complex number, which can be written as:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;right&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Z &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;RX&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;+ j &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&amp;sup2;XL &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&amp;sup2; + XL&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&amp;sup2; + XL&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;To verify this mathematical expression, let&#039;s try a practical example. Let V&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;10&amp;nbsp;volts&amp;nbsp;RMS, with R&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;10&amp;Omega; and L&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;0.01H and frequency =100 Hz. Then: XL = 2*Pi*100*0.01 = 6.283 &amp;Omega;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.88&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The next step is to calculate Z using the equation we derived earlier, and compare that result with the result above. If we&#039;ve done our math correctly, the results should match. For simplicity we will first calculate the denominator (D) value and the two numerators (N1 and N2). Then we can insert those values into the final equation.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&amp;sup2; + X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;10&amp;sup2; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;139.4784175&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;9&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;N1 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp; 6.2831853&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;628.31853&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Now we can insert these values into the  full equation and solve for Z:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(28.2589)&amp;frac12; &amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;238&quot; colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;11&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;5.32&amp;Omega;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;We see that both sets of calculations produce precisely the same answer. This indicates that our method for calculating impedance without using (or knowing) the signal voltage is perfectly valid.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;This can be verified using the simulator my creating the above mentioned parallel RL circuit and by measuring the current and voltage across the resistor and inductor. It should consistent with the earlier findings. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;273&quot; width=&quot;306&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image003(5).jpg&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
  99      (590,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Components&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tResistor:&lt;/strong&gt; A resistor is a two-terminal electronic component that produces a voltage across its terminals that is proportional to the electric current through it in accordance with Ohm&#039;s law.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tLamp:&lt;/strong&gt; A lamp is a replaceable component such as an incandescent light bulb, which is designed to produce light from electricity. These components usually have a base of ceramic, metal, glass or plastic, which makes an electrical connection in the socket of a light fixture.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tWire:&lt;/strong&gt; A wire is a single, usually cylindrical, elongated string of metal. Wires are used to bear mechanical loads and to carry electricity and telecommunications signals. Wire is commonly formed by drawing the metal through a hole in a die or draw plate.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tSwitch:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a switch is an electrical component that can break an electrical circuit, interrupting the current or diverting it from one conductor to another.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tBattery:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a battery or voltaic cell is a combination of many electrochemical Galvanic cells of identical type to store chemical energy and to deliver higher voltage or higher current than with single cells.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tVoltmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A voltmeter is an instrument used for measuring the electrical potential difference between two points in an electric circuit. Analog voltmeters move a pointer across a scale in proportion to the voltage of the circuit; digital voltmeters give a numerical display of voltage by use of an analog to digital converter.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tAmmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; An ammeter is a measuring instrument used to measure the electric current in a circuit. Electric currents are measured in amperes (A), hence the name.&#039;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tNon-contact ammeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A type of ammeter that need not be a part of the circuit.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 100      (594,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;For more info on DC circuits one may read books, visit labs or check for other web contents. Here are some choices for reading material.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Reference:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; class=&quot;content&quot; id=&quot;myTable&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;3%&quot; valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;97%&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: none;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9780891001218&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9780891001218&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Rosen, Stan. D. C. Circuits. Riverton: Aviation Maintenance Publishers, 1980.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9780891001218&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Robert C. Carter, Introduction to electrical circuit analysis, Holt, Rinehart and Winston, 1966.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; \t &lt;!--\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Reference:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br  /&gt;\r\n&lt;blockquote&gt;\r\n1.\tStan Rosen, DC Circuits, Jeppesen, 1980, ISBN: 9780891001218 &lt;br  /&gt;\r\n2.\tRobert C. Carter, Introduction to electrical circuit analysis, Holt, Rinehart and Winston, 1966.      &lt;/blockquote&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n--&gt;       &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Webliography:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; 1.\tModified Nodal Analysis. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2.\tMatrix operations. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n3.\tGraph theory. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;/blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;\t      &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 101      (323,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The schematic diagram below shows three components connected in parallel, and to an ac voltage source: an ideal inductance, and ideal capacitance, and an ideal resistance. In keeping with our previous examples using inductors and capacitors together in a circuit, we will use the following values for our components:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.&amp;nbsp; VAC = 100 vrms.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2.&amp;nbsp; f = 10 Hz. (&lt;img height=&quot;7&quot; width=&quot;9&quot; alt=&quot;radians/sec&quot; src=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/theory_clip_image001_0001.gif&quot; /&gt; = 62.831853        rad/sec)&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n3.&amp;nbsp; L = 2 H. &amp;lt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n4.&amp;nbsp; C = 0.0003&amp;lt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n5.&amp;nbsp; R = 10 &lt;img height=&quot;10&quot; width=&quot;9&quot; alt=&quot;ohms&quot; src=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/vlab/PHY/BEC/Parallel-RLC-Circuits/theory_clip_image002_0001.gif&quot; /&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;XL = 2&amp;pi;f  *L=2*&amp;pi;*10*2 = 125.663706 &amp;Omega; &lt;br /&gt;\r\nXC = 1/2&amp;pi;f  *C = 1/ 2* &amp;pi;*10*0.0003 = 53.0617826845 &amp;Omega;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;According to Ohm&#039;s  Law:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;/X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; = 100/125.663706    = 0.795774 = 0.8 A.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;/X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; = 100/53.0617827    = 1.884595 = 1.89 A.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;/R = 100/10 = 10 A.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;If we measure the  current from the voltage source, we find that it supplies a total of 10.06 A to  the combined load &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;So we now have 10 A of resistive current and just over 1.09 A of reactive current, and yet the measured total current is 10.06 A. By now, you probably expected this, and you&#039;re familiar with the reasons for this apparent discrepancy. Nevertheless, it is worthwhile to complete the exercise and study this circuit in detail.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The  Vectors&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;175&quot; width=&quot;100&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image003.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;As usual, the  vectors, shown to the right, tell the story. Since this is a parallel circuit,  the voltage, &lt;em&gt;v&lt;/em&gt;, is the same across all components. It is the current that has different phases and amplitudes within the different components. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since voltage is the same throughout the circuit, we use it as the reference, at 0&amp;deg;. Current through the resistor is in phase with the voltage dropped across that resistor, so iR also appears at 0&amp;deg;.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nCurrent through an inductor lags the applied voltage, so iL appears at -90&amp;deg;. Current through a capacitor leads the applied voltage, so iC appears at +90&amp;deg;. Since iC is greater than iL, the net reactive current is capacitive, so its phase angle is +90&amp;deg;.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nNow the total current, iT, is the vector sum of reactive current and resistive current. Since iR is significantly greater than the difference, iC&amp;nbsp;-&amp;nbsp;iL, the total impedance of this circuit is mostly resistive, and the combined vector for iT is at only a small phase angle, as shown in the diagram.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;    &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The  Mathematics&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nNow that we have the vectors above, we have a pretty clear idea of how the currents through the different components in this circuit relate to each other, and to the total current supplied by the source. Of course, we could draw these vectors precisely to scale and then measure the results to determine the magnitude and phase angle of the source current. However, such measurements are limited in precision. We can do far better by calculating everything and then using experimental measurements to verify that our calculations fit the real-world circuit.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nWe start with a few  basic expressions:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;T&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(i&lt;sub&gt;X&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; + i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2;)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;13&quot; width=&quot;7&quot; src=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/vlab/PHY/BEC/Parallel-RLC-Circuits/image004.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;arctan&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;X&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;where&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;X&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span       &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;13&quot; width=&quot;7&quot; src=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/vlab/PHY/BEC/Parallel-RLC-Circuits/image004.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Phase angle.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Now we simply insert  the values we determined earlier and solve these expressions:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td height=&quot;41&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;T&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n                        &lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n                        &lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(i&lt;sub&gt;X&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2; + i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2;)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n                        &lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;((1.884595 &amp;nbsp;- 0.795774)&amp;sup2; + 10&amp;sup2;)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(101.185531170041)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;    = 10.06 A&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;13&quot; width=&quot;7&quot; rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;65&quot; rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;arctan&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;55&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp; i&lt;sub&gt;X&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;175&quot; rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span &lt;div&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;left&quot; width=&quot;49&quot; size=&quot;1&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp; i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;arctan&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.088821&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;10&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;arctan 0.1088821&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;6.214&amp;deg;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;These figures match the initial measured value for current from the source, and fit the rough vector diagram as well. Therefore, we can be confident that our calculations and diagram are accurate.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;When  X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; = X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nWhen a circuit of  this type operates at resonance, so that X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;,  it must also follow that i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;. Therefore, i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;-&amp;nbsp;i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;0,  and the only current supplied by the source is i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nThis is in fact the case. At resonance, current circulates through L and C without leaving these two components, and the source only needs to supply enough current to make up for losses. In this case, R represents the energy losses within the circuit, and is the only component that draws current from the source. The effective impedance of the circuit is nothing more than R, and the current drawn from the source is in phase with the voltage.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;This can be verified using the simulator my creating the above mentioned parallel LCR circuit and by measuring the current and voltage across the inductor, capacitor and resistor. The values should be consistent with the earlier findings. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;282&quot; width=&quot;301&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image006(3).jpg&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: left;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;At resonance the effective impedance of the circuit is nothing more than R, and the current drawn from the source is in phase with the voltage. The resonance frequency in our example is 6.5 Hz.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;283&quot; width=&quot;302&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image008(3).jpg&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 102      (324,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Components&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tResistor:&lt;/strong&gt; A resistor is a two-terminal electronic component that produces a voltage across its terminals that is proportional to the electric current through it in accordance with Ohm&#039;s law.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tLamp:&lt;/strong&gt; A lamp is a replaceable component such as an incandescent light bulb, which is designed to produce light from electricity. These components usually have a base of ceramic, metal, glass or plastic, which makes an electrical connection in the socket of a light fixture.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tWire:&lt;/strong&gt; A wire is a single, usually cylindrical, elongated string of metal. Wires are used to bear mechanical loads and to carry electricity and telecommunications signals. Wire is commonly formed by drawing the metal through a hole in a die or draw plate.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tSwitch:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a switch is an electrical component that can break an electrical circuit, interrupting the current or diverting it from one conductor to another.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tBattery:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a battery or voltaic cell is a combination of many electrochemical Galvanic cells of identical type to store chemical energy and to deliver higher voltage or higher current than with single cells.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tVoltmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A voltmeter is an instrument used for measuring the electrical potential difference between two points in an electric circuit. Analog voltmeters move a pointer across a scale in proportion to the voltage of the circuit; digital voltmeters give a numerical display of voltage by use of an analog to digital converter.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tAmmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; An ammeter is a measuring instrument used to measure the electric current in a circuit. Electric currents are measured in amperes (A), hence the name.&#039;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tNon-contact ammeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A type of ammeter that need not be a part of the circuit.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 103      (328,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;For more info on DC circuits one may read books, visit labs or check for other web contents. Here are some choices for reading material.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Reference:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; class=&quot;content&quot; id=&quot;myTable&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;3%&quot; valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;97%&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: none;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9780471320579&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9780471320579&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Resnick, Robert et.al. Physics. New York: Wiley, 2002.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9780471320579&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: none;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9788126518944&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9788126518944&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;University Physics, Revised Ed, Harris Benson, Wiley-India, 2008&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9788126518944&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;3&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: none;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9780495113690&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9780495113690&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Serway, Raymond et.al. College Physics. Australia: Thomson Brooks/Cole, 2006.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9780495113690&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;4&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT-JEE  Physics- S.P.Arya, MTG Books, 2007&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;5&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Electric  circuits- David A.Bell, Oxford University press,  Seventh Edition 2009&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;       &lt;!--\r\n&lt;body onUnload=&quot;checkEmbeddability();&quot; &gt;\r\n&lt;/body&gt;\r\n--&gt;       &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Webliography:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;       1.\tModified Nodal Analysis. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2.\tMatrix operations. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n3.\tGraph theory. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div class=&quot;postConentPadding&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;link type=&quot;text/css&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/css/default.css&quot; /&gt;&lt;style type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;&lt;/style&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;  &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;\r\n&lt;div style=&quot;padding-left: 50px;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; &lt;strong&gt;Experiment Mapping &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;\r\n&lt;table width=&quot;85%&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;caption class=&quot;tableHeading&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/caption&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;tagExpHead&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Subject&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Courses&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;34%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Level&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Electrostatics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Quantitative Circuit Analysis&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Guwahati&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches (PH-110)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span
