style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- U G All Branches (PHP100)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Bombay&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- M Sc Physics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;NIT Tiruchirapally&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Under Graduate (UG)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Graduate (G)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 104      (414,'&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-size: medium;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Introduction:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;704&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;In this experiment we will use a diffraction grating optical spectrometer to study atomic spectra, we will use the calibrated spectrometer to observe and measure the spectral lines of hydrogen,Mercury and Neon&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            The diffraction grating provides the simplest and most accurate method for measuring wavelengths of light. It consists of a very large number of fine, equally spaced, parallel slits, usually thousands of lines (slits) per centimeter. Transmission gratings are ruled on glass and the unruled areas transmit the incident light.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            Diffraction refers to the &amp;quot;bending&amp;quot; of waves around sharp edges or corners. The slits of a grating give rise to diffraction and the diffracted light interferes so as to set up interference patterns. Complete constructive interference occurs when the phase or path difference is equal to some whole number of the wavelength. In general the grating equation for constructive maxima is&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td align=&quot;right&quot; width=&quot;282&quot; valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;a toptions=&quot;width = 660, height = 440, type = flash, title = Emission Spectra&quot; href=&quot;http://www.youtube.com/v/jaOzC0leAdk&amp;amp;hl=en&amp;amp;fs=1&amp;amp;rel=0&amp;amp;hd=1&amp;amp;autoplay=1&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;157&quot; width=&quot;261&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/video2.jpg&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nSin &amp;theta; = Nm &amp;lambda; &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nwhere &lt;b&gt;m &lt;/b&gt; is called the order of the spectrum, &lt;b&gt;&amp;lambda;&lt;/b&gt; is the wavelength, &lt;b&gt;N&lt;/b&gt; is the number of lines per unit length and &lt;b&gt;&amp;theta;&lt;/b&gt; is the diffraction angle measured with respect to the direction of the light incident on the grating. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The apparatus:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Make yourself familiar with the parts of the spectrometer. Be sure you understand the purpose and the operation of each part. The light to be analyzed must pass through the grating as a parallel beam so that the direction of all rays will be the same and can be measured.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot; class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;234&quot; width=&quot;424&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/spectroMeter.jpg&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The primary parts of the spectrometer are:&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;b&gt;Collimator:&lt;/b&gt; A slit and a converging lens are located at opposite ends of the collimator tube. When the slit is illuminated and positioned at the focal point of the lens, parallel rays of light will exit from the lens.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;b&gt;Table:&lt;/b&gt; A central horizontal shelf for mounting either a prism or a grating.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;b&gt;Telescope:&lt;/b&gt; An objective lens focuses the entering parallel rays in a plane so that the real image can be observed with the aid of the eyepiece. Cross hairs located in the focal plane of the objective lens provide a precise means for locating the direction of these rays. &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;b&gt;Angular scale:&lt;/b&gt; A circular scale of 360&lt;sup&gt;o&lt;/sup&gt; can be anchored to the arm that supports the telescope. This allows you to determine the angular position of the telescope relative to the collimator from the reading of a vernier scale fixed to the base of the spectrometer.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Initial Setup and Adjustments:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; Sight with the telescope at some distant object . Adjust the main telescope tube until the object and the cross hairs are in sharp focus&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nMove the telescope into line with the collimator. Place the mercury light source just behind the collimator entrance slit. While observing the slit through the telescope, slide the collimator slit tube in or out until the vertical slit image and the cross hairs are both in sharp focus.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nThe collimator slit width is adjustable by a small screw near the slit. Use the screw to make the slit narrow enough to define the source position, yet wide enough to allow the passage of light sufficient for easy viewing. A narrow slit gives greater resolution and greater accuracy.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nWith the cross hairs centered on the slit image, loosen the set screw of the angular scale and adjust it to read 180.0 degrees for this straight through reading.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nRotate the spectrometer table so the groove across the diameter is approximately perpendicular to the light from the collimator and lock the table in this position.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nPlace the diffraction grating in the table groove such that the grating slits are vertical.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-size: medium;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Experimental procedure:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot; class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-size: medium;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;179&quot; width=&quot;372&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/diagram.jpg&quot; /&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: left;&quot; class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The preliminary adjustments of the spectrometer are made the vernier table is rotated to a position that the light from the collimator falls on the granting almost normally. The diffracted image (color lines)of the first order on the left side is obtained in the telescope. The vernier table is slowly rotated so that the refracted image moves towards the position of the direct image. The rotation is continued until the image just begin to retrace ,this is the minimum deviation position,the vernier table is clamped.The telescope is adjusted so that the vertical cross wires coincides with the center of the image . So the Angle of Minimum Deviation&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;b&gt;Vernier1&lt;/b&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2&amp;theta; =Vernier1 Angle (LEFT)-  Vernier1 Angle (RIGHT)&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;b&gt;Vernier 2&lt;/b&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2&amp;theta; =Vernier2 Angle (LEFT) - Vernier2 Angle (RIGHT)&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\nTake the Mean of Minimum Deviation of vernier1 and vernier2 and calculate &amp;theta; &lt;br /&gt;\r\nSin &amp;theta;  = Nm&amp;lambda;      assuming m=1            and       N=600000 lines/m  &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&amp;lambda; (Wavelength)=Sin &amp;theta; / Nm        &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitle&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 105      (415,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Performing the Simulation&lt;/strong&gt;:&lt;br /&gt;\r\nThe simulation virtualizes the Hydrogen spectrum experiment . The user can use a grating spectrometer to measure the wavelengths of H-alpha, H-beta, H-gamma, and H-delta lines in the visible spectrum of hydrogen ,Yellow,Green.Violet and red lines in the visible spectrum of Mercury and green,yellow,dark red and red lines of Neon &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;Components&lt;/strong&gt;:&lt;br /&gt;\r\nSpectrometer, Grating, Hydrogen Vapour Lamp , Mercury  Vapour Lamp and Neon Vapour Lamp  &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;Help &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;&lt;u&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/u&gt;Variable  Region&lt;/strong&gt; &lt;br /&gt;\r\n1. Telescope calibrate Slider:Telescope Slider helps the user to change the focus of telescope&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2. Telescope Angle Slider:Telescope Slider helps the user to change the angle of telescope&lt;br /&gt;\r\n3. Vernier Angle Slider:Vernier Slider helps the user to  change the angle of Vernier&lt;br /&gt;\r\n4. Lamp Selector:Lamp Selector helps the user to select  the lamp&lt;br /&gt;\r\n5.Start Button:Helps the user to start the experiment after setting the focus of telescope .start Button will activate only if the telescope focus is proper.&lt;br /&gt;\r\n6.Light Toggle Button:Helps the user to switch ON or OFF the lamp  &lt;br /&gt;\r\n7.Grating Toggle Button:Helps the user to place or remove the   grating&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;Measurement Region&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n1.Diffracted Image readings of Vernier1 and vernier2 in left and right position of telescope&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2.Calibrating Telescope Button:Helps the user to  Calibrating the  Telescope after starting the experiment ,if needed &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 106      (330,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The schematic diagram below shows an ideal series circuit containing inductance and capacitance but no resistance. As with the RC and LC circuits we have already examined, capacitor C and inductor L form a voltage divider across the voltage source. In this case, however, we have no resistance to provide an absolute limit on the current that can flow through the circuit &amp;mdash; we have only X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;  and X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;For this  example, we&#039;ll assume a frequency of 10 Hz . We&#039;ll also set L&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;1.5H  and C&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;0.0001&amp;nbsp;F. The source voltage is 10&amp;nbsp;vrms.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;When we  measure the ac voltages across L and C, we find v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;14.44  v and v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;= 24.44 v. Yet our source voltage is still just 10v. What&#039;s going on here? How can we get 76v across two components in series across a 10v source?&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The answer  is clear when we look at the voltage vectors in this circuit. They are shown below&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;175&quot; width=&quot;100&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image001(3).gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since this is a series circuit, the current is the same throughout the circuit. With no circuit resistance, there is no resistive voltage, so we simply show the current vector in red, at the reference phase angle of 0&amp;deg;.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;We know that  voltage leads current in an inductance, so we show v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; at a phase  angle of +90&amp;deg;. We also know that voltage lags current in a capacitance, so we  show v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; at -90&amp;deg;. And this gives us our first clue as to what is  happening in this circuit and how we can get both v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; to be higher than the source voltage: they oppose each other, and at least partially cancel each other out. It is the difference between these two voltages that must match the source voltage, and sure enough, 43v&amp;nbsp;-&amp;nbsp;33v&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;10v.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;If X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;  &amp;gt; X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, the combined circuit looks purely inductive to the source.  If X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; &amp;gt; X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;, the circuit looks capacitive. The only  real question left is how to determine the lengths of the two vectors for v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;  and v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Our calculations for  this circuit are based on Ohm&#039;s Law, just as they have been for other circuits.  In general terms,&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Z&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since this is a  series circuit, i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;i and we  can use i as the reference value for all of our calculations. Also, since both  X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; require us to determine the value of 2&amp;pi;f  (=&amp;nbsp;&amp;omega;), let&#039;s calculate that now. For a frequency of 1 MHz,&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega; = 2&amp;pi;f = 6.283185 &amp;times; 10 = 62.83185 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Now we can complete  our calculations, starting with X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;, X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, and Z:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;XL&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;94&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega;L&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;104&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;198&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;62.831853 &amp;times; 1.5&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;198&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;94.2477795 &amp;Omega;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot; rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;194&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;4&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;194&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;4&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;194&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;0.154066198776 &amp;times; 94.247775&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;198&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;14.52 v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;198&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i &amp;times; X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;198&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;0.154066199250 &amp;times; 159.15495&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;5&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;17&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;198&quot; colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;24.52 v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Note that the  difference between v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; is precisely 10 volts &amp;mdash; the value of the voltage source. Nevertheless, the voltages across L and C each exceed the source voltage by several times. This is only possible because of the phase relationship between v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;: these voltages  are always opposite in phase.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;399&quot; width=&quot;434&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image002(3).png&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since the total  impedance of this circuit is the &lt;em&gt;difference&lt;/em&gt; between X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, what happens if these two values are equal? There will be some frequency at which this will be the case, so we need to consider it. How will the circuit behave in this case?&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;When  XL&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;XC&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;We have examined one specific case of a series LC circuit and its behavior at one particular frequency. We also know that at higher frequencies X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; will increase  while X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; decreases. At lower frequencies, of course, X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;  will decrease while X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; increases.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The question that  begs to be asked is, How does the circuit behave at the frequency where X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;?  Also, how can we determine what that frequency will be?&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Finding the  &amp;quot;magic&amp;quot; frequency is not a problem. Since both X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;  depend on frequency, we simply set the two to be equal to each other, and solve  the resulting expression for frequency:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega;L&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega;C&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega;&amp;sup2;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;LC&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;11&quot; width=&quot;25&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image003(1).gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;f&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;2&amp;pi;&amp;nbsp;&lt;img height=&quot;11&quot; width=&quot;25&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image004.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The resonant frequency is the same with an ac voltage applied, but the continuous ac input makes up for any losses in the circuit so the oscillations never die out.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;At resonance, since X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;  = X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, it is also true that X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;-&amp;nbsp;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;0. Therefore, there is absolutely no reactive component to Z at the resonant frequency. In the absence of any resistance, current i rises without limit, and becomes theoretically infinite. The voltage source behaves as if it were directly short-circuited.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;In reality, no circuit is completely without resistance, and the resistance present will serve to limit the current from the source. However, if the resistance is very small, the current will still be high. In some cases, a resistor is deliberately added, to set a minimum impedance and maximum current at resonance.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;This can be verified using the  simulator by changing the frequency of the previous example to 13Hz.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 107      (331,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Components&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tResistor:&lt;/strong&gt; A resistor is a two-terminal electronic component that produces a voltage across its terminals that is proportional to the electric current through it in accordance with Ohm&#039;s law.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tLamp:&lt;/strong&gt; A lamp is a replaceable component such as an incandescent light bulb, which is designed to produce light from electricity. These components usually have a base of ceramic, metal, glass or plastic, which makes an electrical connection in the socket of a light fixture.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tWire:&lt;/strong&gt; A wire is a single, usually cylindrical, elongated string of metal. Wires are used to bear mechanical loads and to carry electricity and telecommunications signals. Wire is commonly formed by drawing the metal through a hole in a die or draw plate.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tSwitch:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a switch is an electrical component that can break an electrical circuit, interrupting the current or diverting it from one conductor to another.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tBattery:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a battery or voltaic cell is a combination of many electrochemical Galvanic cells of identical type to store chemical energy and to deliver higher voltage or higher current than with single cells.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tVoltmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A voltmeter is an instrument used for measuring the electrical potential difference between two points in an electric circuit. Analog voltmeters move a pointer across a scale in proportion to the voltage of the circuit; digital voltmeters give a numerical display of voltage by use of an analog to digital converter.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tAmmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; An ammeter is a measuring instrument used to measure the electric current in a circuit. Electric currents are measured in amperes (A), hence the name.&#039;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tNon-contact ammeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A type of ammeter that need not be a part of the circuit.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 108      (335,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;For more info on DC circuits one may read books, visit labs or check for other web contents. Here are some choices for reading material.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Reference:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; class=&quot;content&quot; id=&quot;myTable&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;3%&quot; valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;97%&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: none;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9780891001218&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9780891001218&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Rosen, Stan. D. C. Circuits. Riverton: Aviation Maintenance Publishers, 1980.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9780891001218&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Robert C. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2.\tMatrix operations. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n3.\tGraph theory. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;/blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;div class=&quot;postConentPadding&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;link type=&quot;text/css&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/css/default.css&quot; /&gt;&lt;style type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;&lt;/style&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;  &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;\r\n&lt;div style=&quot;padding-left: 50px;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; &lt;strong&gt;Experiment Mapping &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;\r\n&lt;table width=&quot;85%&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;caption class=&quot;tableHeading&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/caption&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;tagExpHead&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Subject&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Courses&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;34%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Level&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Physics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Electrostatics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Quantitative Circuit Analysis&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Guwahati&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches (PH-110)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Delhi&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- U G All Branches (PHP100)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Bombay&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- M Sc Physics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;NIT Tiruchirapally&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Under Graduate (UG)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Graduate (G)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 109      (419,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;For more info on one may read books, visit labs or check for other web contents. Here are some choices for reading material. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Books&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; style=&quot;margin-left: 70px;&quot; id=&quot;myTable&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;3%&quot; valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;97%&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: block;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9780521763660&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9780521763660&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Quantum Mechanics for Nanostructures, V. V. Mitin, Dmitry I. Sementsov, Nizami Z. Vagidov, 2010 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9780521763660&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot; src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books/api.js?key=notsupplied&amp;amp;v=0&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: block;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9789971502614&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9789971502614&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The Spectrum of atomic hydrogen-advances,World Scientific,, 1988 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Experiment Mapping &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table width=&quot;85%&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;tagExpHead&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Subject&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Courses&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;34%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Level&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Physics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Mechanics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Collision&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Under Graduate (UG)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Graduate (G)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 110      (337,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;When we apply an ac voltage to a resistor and capacitor in series, as shown in the schematic diagram below, the capacitor will constantly charge and discharge, as the input voltage is constantly changing.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Essentially, R and C in this circuit now form a voltage divider for ac. We can expect that part of the applied voltage will appear across R, and part will appear across C. But how much voltage will appear across each component?&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;As a  practical example of such a circuit, assume V&lt;sub&gt;AC&lt;/sub&gt; = 10 vrms at a frequency of 10 Hz. C = 0.01 f and R = 15ohms. If we were to build this circuit with an accurate audio frequency generator, we would measure a voltage of 3 vrms across the resistor, and 9.54 vrms across the capacitor. This of course adds up to considerably more than the 10 vrms supplied by the generator. How is this possible?&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The question is compounded by the fact that C will cause a phase shift between voltage and current. Since this is a series circuit, the current must necessarily be the same everywhere in the circuit. Therefore the voltage across the capacitor will lag that current by 90&amp;deg;, while at the same time the voltage across the resistor will be in phase with the current. How can we deal with such a mess?&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The real problem here  is that 90&amp;deg; phase shift between v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; and v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;. Since they are not in phase and some voltage is dropped across each component, the phase relationship between generator voltage and generator current must be somewhere between the two extremes. We need to be able to determine that relationship, as well as to determine the combined effect of R and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; in this  circuit.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;100&quot; width=&quot;100&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image001(4).gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;One solution is to map the component voltages graphically, as shown to the right. Using X-Y coordinate axes, the positive X axis is defined as the zero-degree reference, and counter-clockwise rotation is defined as the direction of increasing positive angles.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since the circuit current is necessarily the same throughout the circuit, it is used as the reference phase angle. Resistive voltage, v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;, is in phase with the  current as shown in red. Capacitive voltage, v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, is at -90&amp;deg; as shown in blue. In this way, we can represent the voltages across R and C as vectors, having direction as well as magnitude. Now it is clear that the composite voltage comprising both v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt; and v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; must be the vector sum  of the two, as shown in violet.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;To find the composite voltage, we must apply the formula for the diagonal of a rectangle, and find the square root of the sum of the squares:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Another  point to consider here is that this circuit contains both resistance (R) and  reactance (X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;). This is neither a pure resistance or a pure reactance. We need a name for this combined characteristic, and a means of calculating it.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The  name is easy enough; the combined characteristic is named &lt;em&gt;impedance&lt;/em&gt;, and  is represented by the letter Z. To calculate Z, we must first note that, in  accordance with Ohm&#039;s Law, R&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;/I and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;/I. But we already know that the voltages are 90&amp;deg; out of phase. Since the circuit current, i, is the same everywhere, then R and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt; must be 90&amp;deg; out of phase as well. Thus, we must apply the same method for finding Z as we did for finding the composite voltage. The full set of calculations for this circuit, then, using the circuit values given above, is:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;154&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1/2                                                                                                              fC &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1/6.28 &amp;times; 1 &amp;times; 0.01 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1/6.28 &amp;times; 10-2 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;15.92 ohms &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;154&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Z&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(R&amp;sup2; + X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;sup2;)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(5&amp;sup2; + 15.92 &amp;sup2;)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;(25 + 253.45)&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;278.45&amp;frac12; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;16.69 ohms &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p Verdana;&quot;&gt;V&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;I        &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span
