Verdana;&quot;&gt;0.6 A &amp;times; 15.92 ohms &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;9.54 V &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;The  actual phase angle between generator current and generator voltage is (with  voltage lagging current):&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;img height=&quot;10&quot; width=&quot;5&quot; style=&quot;display: inline;&quot; src=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/vlab/PHY/BEC/Series-RC-Circuits/image003.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;= arctan(X&lt;sub&gt; C&lt;/sub&gt; /R) = arctan(15.92/5) = arctan(3.184)  = 72.56&amp;deg; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nThus, all circuit values and calculations remain consistent with each other and with actual measurements made on experimental circuits.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\nThis can be easily verified using the simulator by creating the above mentioned circuit and measuring the current and voltages across the resistor and capacitor. &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot; style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;309&quot; width=&quot;342&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image005(3).jpg&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 111      (338,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Components&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tResistor:&lt;/strong&gt; A resistor is a two-terminal electronic component that produces a voltage across its terminals that is proportional to the electric current through it in accordance with Ohm&#039;s law.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tLamp:&lt;/strong&gt; A lamp is a replaceable component such as an incandescent light bulb, which is designed to produce light from electricity. These components usually have a base of ceramic, metal, glass or plastic, which makes an electrical connection in the socket of a light fixture.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tWire:&lt;/strong&gt; A wire is a single, usually cylindrical, elongated string of metal. Wires are used to bear mechanical loads and to carry electricity and telecommunications signals. Wire is commonly formed by drawing the metal through a hole in a die or draw plate.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tSwitch:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a switch is an electrical component that can break an electrical circuit, interrupting the current or diverting it from one conductor to another.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tBattery:&lt;/strong&gt; In electronics, a battery or voltaic cell is a combination of many electrochemical Galvanic cells of identical type to store chemical energy and to deliver higher voltage or higher current than with single cells.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tVoltmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A voltmeter is an instrument used for measuring the electrical potential difference between two points in an electric circuit. Analog voltmeters move a pointer across a scale in proportion to the voltage of the circuit; digital voltmeters give a numerical display of voltage by use of an analog to digital converter.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tAmmeter:&lt;/strong&gt; An ammeter is a measuring instrument used to measure the electric current in a circuit. Electric currents are measured in amperes (A), hence the name.&#039;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;bull;\tNon-contact ammeter:&lt;/strong&gt; A type of ammeter that need not be a part of the circuit.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;     &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 112      (342,'&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;For more info on DC circuits one may read books, visit labs or check for other web contents. Here are some choices for reading material.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Reference:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; class=&quot;content&quot; id=&quot;myTable&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;3%&quot; valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;97%&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;div style=&quot;display: none;&quot; id=&quot;ISBN:9780891001218&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;javascript:togglePreview(&#039;9780891001218&#039;);&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Rosen, Stan. D. C. Circuits. Riverton: Aviation Maintenance Publishers, 1980.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;script src=&quot;http://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&amp;amp;bibkeys=ISBN:9780891001218&amp;amp;callback=processDynamicLinksResponse&quot; type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\r\n            &lt;br /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Robert C. Carter, Introduction to electrical circuit analysis, Holt, Rinehart and Winston, 1966.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;         &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;contentTitleSmall&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Webliography:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; 1.\tModified Nodal Analysis. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://www.swarthmore.edu/NatSci/echeeve1/Ref/mna/MNA1.html&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n2.\tMatrix operations. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; ]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n3.\tGraph theory. [ &lt;/span&gt;&lt;a target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;]&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;/blockquote&gt;\r\n&lt;div class=&quot;postConentPadding&quot;&gt;\r\n&lt;link type=&quot;text/css&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;http://sakshat.amrita.ac.in/VirtualLab/css/default.css&quot; /&gt;&lt;style type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;&lt;/style&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;  &lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;\r\n&lt;div style=&quot;padding-left: 50px;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt; &lt;strong&gt;Experiment Mapping &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;\r\n&lt;table width=&quot;85%&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;caption class=&quot;tableHeading&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp; &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/caption&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;tagExpHead&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Subject&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;33%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Courses&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n            &lt;th width=&quot;34%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;Level&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/th&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr class=&quot;txtarea&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Physics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Electrostatics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;5%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- Quantitative Circuit Analysis&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Guwahati&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches (PH-110)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Delhi&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- U G All Branches (PHP100)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;IIT Bombay&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- M Sc Physics&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;NIT Tiruchirapally&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;10%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;90%&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;- B Tech All Branches&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td valign=&quot;top&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;table border=&quot;0&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot;&gt;\r\n                &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Under Graduate (UG)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                    &lt;tr&gt;\r\n                        &lt;td width=&quot;95%&quot; colspan=&quot;2&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Graduate (G)&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\r\n                    &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n                &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n            &lt;/table&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;/div&gt;\r\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'),
 113      (344,'&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;175&quot; width=&quot;125&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image001(5).gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\r\n&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;ol type=&quot;1&quot; start=&quot;1&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;ul type=&quot;disc&quot;&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;f = 10 Hz&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;e = 100 vrms&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;L = 2 H&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;C = 0.0003 F&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R = 10 &amp;Omega;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n    &lt;/ul&gt;\r\n&lt;/ol&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Our measured voltages  come out as follows:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;ol type=&quot;1&quot; start=&quot;1&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;ul type=&quot;disc&quot;&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;  = 171.66v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;  = 72.6v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n        &lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;  = 13.68v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n    &lt;/ul&gt;\r\n&lt;/ol&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The Vectors&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;img height=&quot;175&quot; width=&quot;100&quot; src=&quot;DATABASEPROJECTROOTFOLDERNAMEuserfiles/image002.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; /&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;As before, we must take into account the different phase angles between voltage and current for each of the three components in the circuit. The vector diagram to the right, while not to scale, illustrates this concept.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since this is a series circuit, the current is the same through all components and is therefore our reference at a phase angle of 0&amp;deg;. This is shown in red in the diagram. The resistor&#039;s voltage, v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;, is in phase with the current and is shown in  green. The blue vector shows v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; at +90&amp;deg;, while the gold vector  represents v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, at -90&amp;deg;. Since they oppose each other diametrically,  the total reactive voltage is v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;-&amp;nbsp;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;. It is  this difference vector that is combined with v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt; to find v&lt;sub&gt;T&lt;/sub&gt;  (shown in cyan in the diagram).&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;We already know that  v&lt;sub&gt;T&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;10&amp;nbsp;vrms. Now we can see that v&lt;sub&gt;T&lt;/sub&gt; is  also the vector sum of (v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;-&amp;nbsp;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;) and v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;.  In addition, because of the presence of R, the phase angle between v&lt;sub&gt;T&lt;/sub&gt;  and i will be arctan((v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;-v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;)/v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;), and can vary  from -90&amp;deg; to +90&amp;deg;.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The  Mathematics&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;As always, voltage  and current calculations for this circuit are based on Ohm&#039;s Law. Our basic  expressions are:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;R&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td rowspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;div align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;hr align=&quot;center&quot; width=&quot;100%&quot; size=&quot;2&quot; /&gt;\r\n            &lt;/div&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Z&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n    &lt;/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;/table&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Since this is a  series circuit, the value of &lt;em&gt;i&lt;/em&gt; in each expression is the same. That is,  i&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;i&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;i&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;i, and we can use i as our reference value for our calculations. We will also need to know the value of &amp;omega; (=&amp;nbsp;2&amp;pi;f) to determine X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt; and X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;.  For f&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;1&amp;nbsp;MHz,&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;omega; = 2&amp;pi;f = 6.2831853 &amp;times; 10 = 62.831853 &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;Now we can complete  our calculations, starting with X&lt;sub&gt;L&lt;/sub&gt;, X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;, and Z:&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;left&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p align=&quot;center&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n&lt;table cellspacing=&quot;0&quot; cellpadding=&quot;0&quot; border=&quot;0&quot;&gt;\r\n    &lt;tbody&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td width=&quot;19&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family:        &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;171.4 v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i &amp;times; X&lt;sub&gt;C&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.364491 &amp;times; 53.061782&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;72.4 v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;v&lt;sub&gt;R&lt;/sub&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;i &amp;times; R&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;1.364491 &amp;times; 10&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;=&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n            &lt;td&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: Verdana;&quot;&gt;13.6 v&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\r\n            &lt;/td&gt;\r\n        &lt;/tr&gt;\r\n        &lt;tr&gt;\r\n            &lt;td colspan=&quot;3&quot;&gt;\r\n            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span
